title.rendered: Puma employees spend a fun day with Mission Education children

content.rendered:
Puma employees on the eve of Christmas spread much joy and love in one of the Mission Education centres of Smile Foundation. The employees spend quality time interacting and playing games with the children. Everybody had a field day and the children were very happy by the love they received from the Puma employees..

One of the employees also spoke of her experience of visiting the centre. She said, “The visit to Sumangali Seva Ashram was definitely a memorable day. The feeling one gets to see the happiness and sheer excitement in the eyes of all the kids is unexplainable. We as a team had an amazing day spreading the Christmas cheer among all kids; we got the chance to interact with a lot of sharp minds of the future generation to come. All in all, it was a wonderful experience and I hope to be a part of many more such activities to come”.
